name: Scyther
flavorText:
With ninja-like
agility and speed,
it can create the illusion that
there is more
than one.

previous.name: Mr. Mime
previous.flavorText:
If interrupted
while it is
miming, it will slap around the
offender with its
broad hands.

next.name: Jynx
next.flavorText:
It seductively
wiggles its hips
as it walks. It can cause people
to dance in
unison with it.

pokemon.name: Scyther
pokemon.flavorText:
With ninja-like
agility and speed,
it can create the illusion that
there is more
than one.

pokemon.name: Scizor
pokemon.flavorText:
It has a steel-hard body. It
intimidates foes by upraising its
eye-patterned pincers.

pokemon.name: Kleavor
pokemon.flavorText:
A violent creature that fells towering trees with its crude axes
and shields itself with hard stone. If one should chance upon
this Pokémon in the wilds, one's only recourse is to flee.
